2020-12-06T19:03:56Z: Just one race left in the tank, folks! We'll see you next weekend for the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. See ya later!

2020-12-06T18:58:18Z: Racing Point tickled pink by that result, which elevates the team back to third in the constructors'.

2020-12-06T18:41:39Z: Perez now has 9.6s over Ocon now.
